package.description: The Data IO service is used to broker data requests with configured data providers. The built-in interchange format is loosely modelled on the Account Manager 4 Data and Group object model, but the implementation is open for any object type.

static-class.name: service
static-class.description: Static implementation of the hemi.data.io.proxy.serviceImpl class.

package.class:
serviceImpl 3.5.1 The Data IO proxy service marshals custom protocol requests through Data IO providers.
Change the bus type automatically based on the transaction
buildMatcher Builds the expression matcher for custom protocols.
unregister Internal Provider Structure Bit indicating the provider was unregistered as providing a proxy. Delinks a provider from a custom protocol proxy.
register Internal Provider Structure Bit indicating the provider was registered as providing a custom protocol proxy. Links a provider to a custom protocol proxy.
isProxyProtocol A URI pattern. Bit indicating the provided URI pattern matches a registered protocol proxy. Tests whether a URI pattern matches a registered protocol proxy.
isProxied A URI pattern. The bus type to use when determining proxy applicability. Bit indicating the provided URI pattern matches a registered protocol proxy. Tests whether a URI pattern may be proxied based on a custom protocol.
b = (b ? b : t.properties.busType);
setAutoChangeBus Bit indicating whether the proxy bus should track with the "iobus" transaction. Specify whether the proxy service should change the current bus based on the "iobus" transaction.
setBusType The current bus. Specify the current bus the proxy service should use.
stripProxyProtocol The current bus. Specify the current bus the proxy service should use.
_handle_change_bus The service handling this channel. The packet being served. Update the proxied bus type from the "iobus" transaction.
proxyXml The URI to an XML/Text/JSON Resource decorated with the proxy protocol. Handler invoked for asynchronous requests. Bit indicating wether the request is asynchronous. Currently limited to synchronous; async requests will be ignored. Identifier associated with the request. Bit indicating wether the request should be made via HTTP POST. Data to be included as the POST payload, such as an XMLDocument, text, or JSON structure. Bit indicating whether the response should be cached. Int indicating whether the request and response as text (1) or JSON (2) instead of XML (0). Returns an internal XML construct. Proxies an XML URI Request to the registered provider for the matching protocol. TODO: Instrument async handling to proxy async Data IO response through XML Async Response.
return b;

index.description: The Data IO service is used to broker data requests with configured data providers. The built-in interchange format is loosely modelled on the Account Manager 4 Data and Group object model, but the implementation is open for any object type.
